page.title: 12Leisure Activity in Upottery
page.content: {Leisure Activity { We did a{survey about leisure.}First we went round to all the classes and asked "What you do in your spare time?" Ten children liked watching televison best from class four. In class two they liked watching televison too. Class one watched televison as well. Thirty seven people liked watching televison in Upottery school. Another popular activity was drawing which was as popular as swimming in most of the classes. Playing various outdoor games was also very popular. One activity which a number mentioned was helping their parents do jobs around the house or farm.
